intro.title: What is V-REST?
intro.description: A lightweight alternative to Postman, combining essential features in one app. Developed in teams of three during the RS School React course, it supports authorization and authentication. Access to the tool is restricted to authorized users. The history section provides quick access to previously executed requests

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Streamline your API development workflow with our comprehensive REST client tool

rest.title: REST Client
rest.description: HTTP client supporting all methods, headers, and request body with real-time response preview

history.title: Request History
history.description: Automatically save and manage your API call history with analytics

codeGeneration.title: Code Generation
codeGeneration.description: Generate code snippets in multiple languages (curl, JavaScript, Python, Java, C#, Go) for your API requests

variables.title: Variables Management
variables.description: Create and reuse variables across requests

lang.title: Multi-Language Support
lang.description: Full internationalization support with multiple language options

Schemas.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
Schemas.letter: Password must contain at least one letter
Schemas.number: Password must contain at least one number
Schemas.specialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character

Variables.heading: Variables
Variables.duplicate: Duplicate keys found: the last value will be applied
